title: Today's Brief - February 22, 2026
description: OpenAI slashes its ambitious spending target from $1.4 trillion to $600 billion by 2030 while cybersecurity stocks crash 8-9% in a "mini-flash crash" after Anthropic unveils AI that can automatically patch code vulnerabilities. Plus, the Supreme Court strikes down global tariffs as AI continues reshaping entire industries from gaming to autonomous vehicles.
